parameters.name: FileName
parameters.description: Path and file name of the free-point curve file that contains the points to load; you can specify .sldcrv files or .txt files that use the same format as .sldcrv files

title: IFreePointCurveFeatureData.LoadPointsFromFile
description: Loads the points for this free-point curve from a file.

parameters.name: FileName
parameters.description: Path and file name of the free-point curve file that contains the points to load; you can specify .sldcrv files or .txt files that use the same format as .sldcrv files

returns: True if the points loaded successfully, false if not
remarks: See SOLIDWORKS Help for details about free-point curve files.
